We're setting up a new newsletter - not just about Quest, but about things that are happening in the wider world of interactive fiction and text adventures too.

We'll be sending the first one of these out in the next day or two, so sign up now to make sure you get yours! http://eepurl.com/qjChH

These will only be sent out 3 or 4 times a year, so we won't be clogging up your inbox too often.
